description: The Calgary Nordic club sets a ski track around the perimeter of Confederation Golf course in winter.It's an easy relatively flat trip right in the city. When it has sufficient snow it's convenient outing for some exercise and practice.
directions: From 19th Street NW turn on to Collingwood Drive at the sign for the golf course. Park on the street as per the sign on the gate to golf course.
title: Confederation Golf Course
